articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Apple will pay $20M to settle Watch battery swelling suit, ‘denies wrongdoing’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple has agreed to pay $20 million to resolve a class-action lawsuit over battery swelling on the Apple Watch. Filed in the U.S. District Court for the
articles.content: Apple has agreed to pay $20 million to resolve a class-action lawsuit over battery swelling on the Apple Watch. Filed in the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California in 2019, the s… [+1939 chars]
